properties.description: The submitter's department or faculty. Make sure to be consistent with the vocabulary used.
properties.title: Department/faculty

create.value: <name type='corporate' authority='lcnaf'><role><roleTerm authority="marcrelator" type="text">Degree granting institution</roleTerm></role></name>

properties.description: This is the faculty member's username. If more than one faculty member is required, select Add button and add another identifier.
This is the departmental identifier. If more than one department is required, select Add button and add another identifier.
The year this document was issued.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the resource that express physical extent. (E.g. number of pages, number of slides, file size, etc.)
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Identifies the institution or repository holding the resource, or a remote location in the form of a URL where it is available. DOI could be used here.
properties.title: Location

properties.description: Multiple subjects allowed. Group related subject elements (topic, geographic, temporal) on each panel.
properties.title: Subjects

properties.description: Use LCSH for Subject entries where possible.
properties.title: Subject

properties.description: General information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages.
properties.title: Use and reproduction

properties.description: Specific restriction on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010").
properties.title: Restriction on Access

properties.description: Keywords supplied by the author. Click the plus button to add more.
properties.title: Author-supplied keywords

properties.description: I have read and agree to the repository submission agreement. (Link here - to follow.)
properties.title: Submission Agreement
